title: Sagars Road, Dural
content: The renovation of this home on Sagars Road in Dural was guided by a clear and considered brief: to create a warm, welcoming residence that feels effortless to live in and enduring in its design. The focus was on delivering spaces that balance comfort, functionality and timeless appeal, while remaining easy to maintain for everyday life. The design approach emphasised simplicity and restraint. Natural light was maximised throughout the home, while a soft, neutral colour palette was selected to establish a calm and inviting atmosphere. Material choices were carefully considered to ensure longevity and versatility, allowing the interiors to evolve gracefully over time. The kitchen was designed as a bright and open space, anchored by white cabinetry that provides a clean and timeless foundation. Warm timber flooring introduces depth and natural character, creating contrast and visual warmth. Soft pendant lighting above the island adds a gentle layer of illumination, reinforcing the kitchenâ€™s role as a welcoming and functional hub of the home. In the bathroom, the design centres on comfort and relaxation. A freestanding bathtub serves as a sculptural focal point, establishing a sense of calm and retreat. A double vanity enhances everyday functionality, while generous windows allow natural light to fill the space, creating an open and airy environment that feels both fresh and serene. Throughout the home, a consistent and restrained material palette reinforces cohesion between spaces. Each element, from layout and lighting to finishes and detailing, was selected to support a sense of ease, warmth and longevity. The completed renovation delivers a home that feels refined yet relaxed, demonstrating how thoughtful design can achieve both beauty and practicality. Sagars Road stands as an example of timeless residential renovation, where simplicity, comfort and careful planning come together to create a space designed to be enjoyed for years to come.
